Queries.AddSavingInfo: INSERT INTO ct_db.saving (InSaving, Saving_Amount, Saving_To, ThroughBy_Saving, Saving_Date, Remarks_Saving, SDT_V, SDT_V_Date, DDT_V_Date, Saving_Bank, S_Insrt_Person) VALUES (@InSaving, @Saving_Amount, @Saving_To, @ThroughBy_Saving, @Saving_Date, @Remarks_Saving, @SDT_V, @SDT_V_Date, @DDT_V_Date, @Saving_Bank, @S_Insrt_Person);
Queries.UpdateSavingData: UPDATE ct_db.saving SET Saving_Amount = @Saving_Amount, Saving_To = @Saving_To, ThroughBy_Saving = @ThroughBy_Saving, Saving_Date = @Saving_Date, Remarks_Saving = @Remarks_Saving, SDT_V = @SDT_V, SDT_V_Date = @SDT_V_Date, DDT_V_Date = @DDT_V_Date, Saving_Bank = @Saving_Bank, S_Updt_Person = @S_Updt_Person WHERE InSaving = @InSaving;
Queries.DeleteSavingData: UPDATE ct_db.saving SET Saving_Amount = @Saving_Amount, Saving_To = @Saving_To, ThroughBy_Saving = @ThroughBy_Saving, Saving_Date = @Saving_Date, Remarks_Saving = @Remarks_Saving, SDT_V = @SDT_V, SDT_V_Date = @SDT_V_Date, DDT_V_Date = @DDT_V_Date, Saving_Bank = @Saving_Bank, S_Del_Person = @S_Del_Person WHERE InSaving = @InSaving;
